mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , NID , NTYPE , NWRITER , NTITLE , NCONTENT , N_FILE_NAME , N_RFILE_NAME , N_DATE , N_MODFIY_DATE , NCOUNT , NSTATUS FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NSTATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NID DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{ startRow } AND RNUM <= #{ endRow }
select * from notice order by nid desc
select * from (select rownum rnum , nid , ntype , ntitle , n_Date , ncount from (select * from notice order by nid desc)) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5
mapper.delete: delete from notice where nid = #{ nid }
mapper.select: select * from notice where ntitle like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select * from notice where nwriter like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select * from notice where n_date between #{ begin } and #{ end }
